Help

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


 Note: Please do not add templates to this category; instead, use one of its subcategories.  Categories of templates grouped by task are listed here. Do not add templates directly to this category; use an appropriate subcategory.    The pages listed in this category are templates. 
 This page is part of Wikipedia's administration and not part of the encyclopedia. 
show
 Further template category notes 

 This category contains pages in the template namespace. It should not be used to categorize articles or pages in other namespaces. 

 




Wikimedia Commons has media related to Commons templates by task.
